Text: Psilocybin mushroom:  Common colloquial terms include magic mushrooms and shrooms.

Text: Psilocybin mushroom:  They are used mainly as an entheogen and recreational drug whose effects can include euphoria, altered thinking processes, closed and open-eye visuals, synesthesia, an altered sense of time and spiritual experiences.
Triplets:<Psilocybin mushroom

--------------------
Text: Psilocybin mushroom:  Biological genera containing psilocybin mushrooms include "Copelandia", "Galerina", "Gymnopilus", "Inocybe", "Mycena", "Panaeolus"," Pholiotina", "Pluteus", and "Psilocybe".
Triplets:<"Copelandia"
